name: Sogrape Vinhos SA
goal: To be the Iberian reference of quality wines, of family tradition, focused on developing relevant brands for consumers in priority markets.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation
euInitiatives: Constructive contibution towards policy devleopment in the fields of WINE CMO, ALCOHOL & HEALTH, CONSUMER INFORMATION, MARKET ACCESS (MINT & COMEX), ENVIRONMENT and INNOVATION
